author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Killing Palestinian civilians won't make Israel any safer -- J. Denny Weaver
text:
Summary by Ground News In 1947 and 1948, the U.N. divided the territory of Palestine into Jewish and Arab sections. In the process, 750,000 Palestinians were expelled, their villages destroyed or dwellings expropriated. For the last 75 years Palestinians have been calling for the same right to exist in a secure homeland. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Madison.com Center High Factuality Killing Palestinian civilians won't make Israel any safer -- J. Denny Weaver A participant in the demonstration for Palestinian rights called the war in Gaza a legacy of colonialism in a Dec. 10 State Journal story, "Crowd calls for cease-fire."
49 minutes ago · Madison, United States Read Full Article
